details: Lead Web Developer on customer product suite
Organize Web Guild/Workshops/Developer summits for a group of 40+ developers across 6 different product teams
Re-architect and the lead the in-place migration of the application with ~5 Million monthly active users
Organized monolith API decomposition to discrete micro-services
Member of API semantic and Data Model standardization guilds
Manage/Maintain cloud native architecture for web applications
Mentor junior and mid-level developers across multiple disciplines
Lead the development team responsible for providing shareable code and infrastructure to support various client applications (Web/Mobile/X1)
Create API Layer to interface between UI and HyperMedia-based RESTful back-end api
Guide and assist junior developers to align with best practices and company standards
Collaborate with product stakeholders to refine feature requests
Architect technical plans for product features
Research new technologies and solutions to solve current technical difficulties
Designed and developed responsive web applications utilizing C#, Entity Framework, ASP.Net, MVC, HTML5, CSS3, and Javascript (JQuery/AngularJS/Modernizr/Babel)
Modernized 50+ existing internal web applications to meet current web standards
Interfaced with project stakeholders to determine requirements and define deadlines
Planned and implemented Data Integration between 3rd party, in-house, and external vendor applications via RESTful Web APIs
Architected relation database schema for all custom applications
Architected Data Warehouse (using the Kimball Method) and developed ETL process for loading data (SSIS).
Created Analytic Layer on top of the Data Warehouse to enable self-service reporting
Provided support for over 50 SQL Servers(2000-2008 R2) in both OLTP and OLAP environments (including Disaster Recovery\Upgrades)
Developed an automated server inventory procedure to provide a detailed history of system status and configuration
Optimized all SQL Server code prior to release by utilizing execution plans and I/O statistics
Developed and maintained a custom data archivingestoration process for the primary operational database
Created a reporting interface to provide end user accessibility to archived data

Developed inventory search application with integration to Facebook (PHP, HTML, JavaScript, XSLT, SQL) /n Provided comprehensive and detailed documentation concerning the setup and maintenance of the Web Application.
